title: How can I install pytorch on Jeson TX2
body_html:
I want to install pytorch 0.4.1 on Jeson TX2 for running deep learning model.

pip3 install torch torchvision said On http://pytorch.org/

When I try to useing that command, it's not working. After googling, I realized that pytorch doesn't supporyt pip install anymore. I want to know how to install on Jeson Tx2
body_text:
I want to install pytorch 0.4.1 on Jeson TX2 for running deep learning model.

pip3 install torch torchvision said On http://pytorch.org/
When I try to useing that command, it's not working. After googling, I realized that pytorch doesn't supporyt pip install anymore. I want to know how to install on Jeson Tx2
body:
I want to install pytorch 0.4.1 on Jeson TX2 for running deep learning model.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37919577/38974572-9f5d108a-43e5-11e8-9a31-5b1e35193ec0.png)

pip3 install torch torchvision said On http://pytorch.org/

When I try to useing that command, it's not working. After googling, I realized that pytorch doesn't supporyt pip install anymore. I want to know how to install on Jeson Tx2
